game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the Lost City of Eldarath
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a long-abandoned city deep in the forest, where an ancient civilization once thrived. Legend has it that a powerful artifact lies within its ruins, waiting to be claimed.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces, a magical amulet granting resistance to darkness
game.quest-giver: Eryndor Thorne, a wise old sage in the village of Willowdale

task.objective: Gather information about the Lost City from the villagers of Willowdale
task.description: Talk to the locals and gather any information they may have about the city's location, layout, and potential dangers.

task.objective: Explore the forest and locate the entrance to the Lost City
task.description: Venture into the forest, navigating through treacherous terrain and avoiding deadly creatures to find the hidden entrance.

task.objective: Navigate the city's ruins and retrieve the artifact
task.description: Cautiously explore the ancient structures, overcoming traps and puzzles to reach the artifact.
